column5: Good Morning Everyone,  I was given a boat recently however as far as I know the motor has not been run in about 3-4 years.  The boat has been sitting outside for this time.  I was wondering what are the first steps I should check to see if the motor will even run? or should I take it to a mech. and see if its worth while to get running?  The motor is a johnson 40hp outboard,  any help would be great or if you need any more info i will try to supply it but im not very knowlegable in this area  Thanks
Awsome thanks that is just what im looking for
